entry.title: Russian Missiles Hit Ukraine Mall as G-7 Leaders Promise More Aid
entry.content: A plodding yet persistent Russian advance and reports of attacks on Ukrainian civilian targets add to pressure on Western leaders meeting at two summits to discuss how to support Kyiv and punish Moscow.

entry.title: Shanghai Has Reopened, but Not Disneyland
entry.content: The theme park remains closed as it and other businesses deal with the possibility of abrupt and disruptive lockdowns because of Chinaâ€™s zero-Covid policy.
